meanings.definition: Of or characteristic of a gentleman or gentlewoman.
meanings.sent1: He always displayed the genteelest manners towards everyone he met.
meanings.sent2: The lady wore the genteelest dress to the ball.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat in the sun with the genteelest of poses, looking quite regal.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the genteelest melody, soothing all who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with the genteelest flowers, their colors vibrant and inviting.

meanings.definition: Most refined or elegant in manner or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The genteelest painting in the gallery caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: She walked with the genteelest grace, turning heads as she passed by.
meanings.sent3: The dog tried to imitate the genteelest cat in the neighborhood, but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in the genteelest hues of pink and gold.
meanings.sent5: His words were the genteelest poetry, touching the hearts of all who listened.
